# G.A. Tucker PI - California Private Investigator

> Licensed California Private Investigator with 27+ years of experience serving Southern California.

## About This Website

This is the official website for G.A. Tucker PI Investigative Services, a professional private investigation firm based in California. Greg Tucker is a licensed private investigator (CA License #PI188351) with advanced degrees in Forensic Psychology, Criminology, and Legal Studies.

## Contact Information

- Phone: 909-964-8976
- Email: gatuckerpi@gmail.com
- Location: Southern California
- License: CA PI License #PI188351

## Services Offered

### Background Checks
Comprehensive background investigations including employment verification, criminal records, and personal history research using exclusive databases.
URL: https://gatuckerpi.com/background-checks

### Private Investigations
Full-service private investigation services for civil and criminal cases, including surveillance, evidence gathering, and witness interviews.
URL: https://gatuckerpi.com/investigations

### Consulting Services
Expert consulting for attorneys including trial preparation, jury selection, witness interviews, and comprehensive case analysis.
URL: https://gatuckerpi.com/consulting

### Risk Management
Professional risk assessment and mitigation strategies to identify threats, protect company resources, and safeguard business interests.
URL: https://gatuckerpi.com/risk-management

### Infidelity Investigations
Discreet and confidential infidelity investigations with professional surveillance and evidence gathering for suspected cheating spouses.
URL: https://gatuckerpi.com/infidelity

### Child Custody Investigations
Professional investigations to gather objective evidence for family court proceedings and protect children's best interests.
URL: https://gatuckerpi.com/child-custody

### Missing Persons
Specialized missing persons investigations using advanced techniques to locate lost family members, runaways, or individuals.
URL: https://gatuckerpi.com/missing-persons

### Behavioral Profiling
Professional behavioral profiling and forensic psychology services for legal strategies and insights.
URL: https://gatuckerpi.com/profiling

### Hollywood Fixer Services
Discreet crisis management and investigations for celebrities, executives, and Fortune 500 companies with absolute confidentiality.
URL: https://gatuckerpi.com/hollywood-fixer

## Credentials & Affiliations

- California PI License #PI188351
- Master of Science in Forensic Psychology - Alliant International University
- Master's Degree in Legal Studies - Washington University School of Law
- Master of Science in Criminology - Kaplan University
- Member: California Association of Licensed Investigators
- Member: World Association of Detectives

## Service Area

G.A. Tucker PI serves all of California with a focus on Southern California, including Los Angeles, Orange County, San Diego, Riverside, and San Bernardino counties.

## Business Hours

Available 24/7 for consultations and emergency situations.

## Pricing

- Hourly Rate: $211/hour for ongoing services (surveillance, locating persons, investigations)
- Flat Fee: Available for short-term or research-intensive cases
- Free initial consultation available

## Why Choose G.A. Tucker PI

- 27+ years of professional experience
- 99% success rate
- Confidentiality guaranteed
- Advanced academic credentials in forensic psychology and criminology
- Trusted by attorneys, corporations, and individuals
- Licensed and insured
